Name: Movavi Video Suite 17 - Video Making Software - Video Editor, Video Converter, Screen Capture, and more

Grab sound from multiple sources simultaneously Capture keyboard and mouse activity Record any screen area: program window, whole screen or any part of the screen Take screenshots at any time Super fast multimedia converter With this utility, you can convert files between 180+ multimedia formats. Change the format of video, audio, and images using SuperSpeed mode in a matter of seconds Edit and enhance the quality of files before conversion Prepare videos for viewing on mobile devices and sharing online Plus Split videos and cut out unwanted segments Create slideshows in 3 easy steps Play back videos and music in any format Burn CDs, DVDs, Blu-rays; rip unencrypted DVDs Capture video from webcams, VHS, and TV-tuners
